question: What is the actual name of the coronavirus?
Which of the following is NOT a symptom of COVID-19?
During the pandemic, should you leave your house for anything that isn't absolutely essential?
While practicing social distancing, how far apart should you stay from others?

answers.text: As far as physically possible. Lock your doors, shut the windows, change your phone number. Forget everyone. You don't need them. Just stay isolated. This is your life now.
Too late, I'm having a panic attack
No! If society hasn't collapsed, if we all just stay home, stay calm, and be smart, everything will be okay and we will get through this.
I will do whatever the news tells me to do
